azurerm_iothub_endpoint_servicebus_queue.description: Manages an IotHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint

name.description: The name of the endpoint. The name must be unique across endpoint types. The following names are reserved:  `events`, `operationsMonitoringEvents`, `fileNotifications` and `$default`.

connection_string.description: The connection string for the endpoint.

id.description: The ID of the IoTHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint.

create.description: Used when creating the IotHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint.

update.description: Used when updating the IotHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint.

read.description: Used when retrieving the IotHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint.

delete.description: Used when deleting the IotHub ServiceBus Queue Endpoint.
